abstract: New York Yankees extend their contract with the radio station WCBS 880 to broadcast their games through the 2012 season.
snippet: The Yankees have extended their contract with the radio station WCBS 880 to broadcast their games through the 2012 season.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees have extended their contract with the radio station WCBS 880 to broadcast their games through the 2012 season.

headline.main: Yankees Stay With WCBS on Radio
headline.print_headline: Yankees Stay With WCBS on Radio
